attributes.additional_details:
The Government should assemble a plan to open schools from September to halt the risk of transmission of COVID-19 towards students and staff.
Also, to avoid any spontaneous precautions revolving around school which could potentially strain pupils mental health.
attributes.background: The Government should assemble a plan to open schools from September.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571980
